name: 14th Annual Meeting of the Portuguese Economic Journal
content: The 14th Annual Meeting of the Portuguese Economic Journal, which will take place at Católica Porto Business School, Universidade Católica Portuguesa, Porto, on July 3-5, 2020\. Submissions in all fields of Economics are welcome and should be made through Conference Maker, at https://editorialexpress.com/conference/PEJ2020/ until March 15, 2020\. Papers should be written in English. The title page should contain the following elements: name of the author(s), affiliation(s), presenter, address(es), email(s), title of the paper, abstract (up to 600 words), keywords and JEL classification codes. The Scientific Committee will not provide referee reports or any detailed feedback on the papers submitted to the conference. Ana Rute Cardoso (Institute for Economic Analysis – CSIC and Barcelona GSE) and Beata Javorcik (University of Oxford) have confirmed their participation as keynote speakers. http://www.catolicabs.porto.ucp.pt/pej2020/
